016package org.asciidoctor.asciidoclet;
017
018import jdk.javadoc.doclet.DocletEnvironment;
019import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Reporter;
020
021import javax.tools.Diagnostic;
022import javax.tools.DocumentationTool;
023import javax.tools.JavaFileManager;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.io.InputStream;
026import java.io.OutputStream;
027import java.util.regex.Matcher;
028import java.util.regex.Pattern;
029
030/**
031 * Responsible for copying the appropriate stylesheet to the javadoc
032 * output directory.
033 */
034public class Stylesheets {
035    
036    static final String JAVA_STYLESHEET_FORMAT = "stylesheet%s.css";
037    static final String JAVA11_STYLESHEET = String.format(JAVA_STYLESHEET_FORMAT, "11");
038
039    private static final String CODERAY_STYLESHEET = "coderay-asciidoctor.css";
040    private static final String OUTPUT_STYLESHEET = "stylesheet.css";
041
042    private final Reporter errorReporter;
043
044    Stylesheets(Reporter errorReporter) {
045        this.errorReporter = errorReporter;
046    }
047    
048    /**
049     * Copies an {@link DocletEnvironment} to this object.
050     * @param environment An environment to be copied to this object.
051     * @return `true` if successfully copied. `false` otherwise.
052     */
053    public boolean copy(DocletEnvironment environment) {
054        String stylesheet = selectStylesheet(System.getProperty("java.version"));
055        errorReporter.print(Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, "stylesheet=<"+ stylesheet + ">");
056        JavaFileManager fm = environment.getJavaFileManager();
057        try (InputStream stylesheetIn = getResource(stylesheet);
058             InputStream coderayStylesheetIn = getResource(CODERAY_STYLESHEET);
059             OutputStream stylesheetOut = openOutputStream(fm, OUTPUT_STYLESHEET);
060             OutputStream coderayStylesheetOut = openOutputStream(fm, CODERAY_STYLESHEET)) {
061            stylesheetIn.transferTo(stylesheetOut);
062            coderayStylesheetIn.transferTo(coderayStylesheetOut);
063            return true;
064        } catch (IOException e) {
065            errorReporter.print(Diagnostic.Kind.ERROR, e.getLocalizedMessage());
066            return false;
067        }
068    }
069
070    private OutputStream openOutputStream(JavaFileManager fm, String filename) throws IOException {
071        return fm.getFileForOutput(DocumentationTool.Location.DOCUMENTATION_OUTPUT, "", filename, null).openOutputStream();
072    }
073
074    private InputStream getResource(String name) throws IOException {
075        ClassLoader loader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
076        if (loader == null) {
077            loader = Stylesheets.class.getClassLoader();
078        }
079        InputStream stream = loader.getResourceAsStream(name);
080        if (stream != null) {
081            return stream;
082        }
083
084        Module module = Stylesheets.class.getModule();
085        if (module != null) {
086            stream = module.getResourceAsStream(name);
087            if (stream != null) {
088                return stream;
089            }
090        }
091
092        throw new IllegalArgumentException("No such resource: " + name);
093    }
094
095    String selectStylesheet(String javaVersion) {
096      String ret;
097        Matcher m = Pattern.compile("^([0-9]+)(\\.)?.*").matcher(javaVersion);
098        if (m.matches()) {
099            int selectedJavaMajorVersion = 11;
100            // It is safe to do parseInt since it is already ensured an integer parsable string by the regex
101            int javaMajorVersionAsInt = Integer.parseInt(m.group(1));
102            // In what version of Java, the stylesheet design was changed? 12, 13, 14?
103            // The threshold 17 should be changed based on it.
104            // Also, the filename stylesheet17.css should also be updated accordingly.
105            if (11 <= javaMajorVersionAsInt  && javaMajorVersionAsInt < 17 )
106                selectedJavaMajorVersion = 11;
107            else if (17 <= javaMajorVersionAsInt)
108                selectedJavaMajorVersion = 17;
109            else
110                errorReporter.print(Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, "Unrecognized Java version " + javaVersion + ", using Java " + selectedJavaMajorVersion + " stylesheet");
111            ret = String.format(JAVA_STYLESHEET_FORMAT, selectedJavaMajorVersion);
112        } else {
113           ret = JAVA11_STYLESHEET;
114           errorReporter.print(Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, "Unrecognizable Java version " + javaVersion + ", using Java 11 stylesheet");
115        }
116        return ret;
117    }
118}
